short_summary: Services de nettoyage et de conciergerie
description: The National Microbiology Laboratory Branch (NMLB) requires the services of a Contractor to provide daily cleaning, weekly/monthly/quarterly/semi-annual/annual tasks and as and when required cleaning services for all buildings listed herein, while allowing for the research and development activities to continue unhindered. It is mandatory that the Bidder or a representative of the Bidder visit the work site. Arrangements have been made for the site visit to be held at 1015 Arlington Street, Winnipeg, MB. R3E 3M4 on November 8, 2022. The site visit will begin at 10:00 am CST. Visitors must wear closed toe shoes and clothing that covers to below the knees. Bidders must communicate with the Contracting Authority no later than November 3, 2022 to confirm attendance and provide the name(s) of the person(s) who will attend.
